action.preview: Click to preview in another tab

body.message1: Do you want to delete the selected folder?
body.message2: Do you want to delete the selected folder permanently?
body.message3: If you delete it, all the related content will be moved to Trash and the folder will no longer be visible.
body.message4: If you delete it, all the related content will be permanently removed and the folder will no longer be recoverable.

edit.rename_warning: You cannot rename a folder as a system one
edit.retention_msg: Messages in this folder which fall within the retention range will require explicit confirmation before being deleted
edit.rtn_dur_warning: The retention duration must be a positive number
edit.threshold_msg: Messages in this folder which are older than the disposal threshold will be subject to automated cleanup and deletion.
edit.title: Edit

body.message1: Do you want to empty the selected folder?
body.message2: If you empty it, all the related content will be deleted permanently.

body.message1: Select a folder to move the considered one to:
Do you want to wipe the selected folder?
body.message2: If you wipe it, all the related content will be deleted permanently.

label.select_1: Select an email to read it
label.subject: Subject:

messages.invalid_address: The following address appears to be invalid
messages.invalid_address_plural: The following addresses appear to be invalid

delete.if_delete_lost_forever: If you delete the email, it will be lost forever.
delete.sure_delete_email: Are you sure to delete the selected email?

redirect.first: This email will be sent on to a new recipient while preserving the email address of the original sender.
redirect.second: This means that it'll look to the new recipient as if the email was originally sent to him or to her.

messages.no_content: This message has no text content

snackbar.conversation_delete_error: Something went wrong, this conversation was not deleted, please try again.
snackbar.conversation_move_error: Something went wrong, conversation move was not completed, please retry.
snackbar.conversation_will_be_deleted_in_time: This conversation will be deleted in {{remainingTime}} seconds.
snackbar.folder_created_error: Something went wrong, new folder was not created, please retry.
snackbar.folder_delete_error: Something went wrong, this folder was not deleted, please retry.
snackbar.folder_edited_error: Something went wrong, changes were not made, please retry.
snackbar.folder_empty_error: Something went wrong, changes were not made, please retry.
snackbar.folder_move_error: Something went wrong, this folder was not moved, please retry.
snackbar.folder_will_be_deleted_in_time: This folder will be deleted in {{remainingTime}} seconds.
snackbar.folder_will_be_moved_in_time: This folder will be moved in {{remainingTime}}
snackbar.folder_will_be_wiped_in_time: This message will be wiped in {{remainingTime}} seconds.
snackbar.message_delete_error: Something went wrong, this message was not deleted, please try again.
snackbar.message_move_error: Something went wrong, this message was not moved, please try again.
snackbar.message_will_be_deleted_in_time: This message will be deleted in {{remainingTime}} seconds.

label.always_dsp_received_time: Always display received time in email list
label.dbl_click_opens_msg: Double-click opens message in new window
label.dsp_external_imgs: Display external images automatically in HTML Email
label.dsp_msg_snpt: Display snippets of messages in mail list
label.set_msg_color_acc_tag: Set colour of messages and conversations according to tag colour.

msg_from_optn.inbox_if_cc: Place in inbox if I'm in To: or Cc:

msg_selection_optn.above_deleted: Select messages above the deleted or moved messages
msg_selection_optn.based_on_previous: Select next message based on previous selections
msg_selection_optn.below_deleted: Select messages below the deleted or moved messages

notify_folder_optn.new_message_folder: Display notifications for new messages in any folder
notify_folder_optn.new_message_inbox: Display notifications for new messages in inbox
